summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of land and other property in the southwest one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of Section 4, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M. for park and playground purposes under Ordinance No. 78386, Cause No. 417021; accepting certain additional condemnation awards therein; making an appropriation by way of a loan from the Cumulative Reserve Fund to pay said additional awards and certain future awards, and providing for repayment; all in addition to the appropriation and loan made under Ordinance No. 79175.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
